example_sentence_english: I'm looking for an inexpensive hotel.

notes: indefinite article before vowel; invariable noun
example_sentence_english: I would like a nearby hotel.

notes: elision of il before vowel; definite article
definite plural article used before vowel and h

example_sentence_english: I talk about the city's hotels.
I am going to the hotel.
I book at the downtown hotels.
I come from the hotels in the area.
I read a review about the hotel.
I have data about local hotels.

notes: contraction of con + i; alternative to con gli
